summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Eng. Dept.; making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund to reimburse the Judgment/Claims Fund for expenditures in settling claims for damage to private property caused by storm water overflow of ditches and culverts (Seyfried and Knight) and property damage caused by the breakage of water drainage and sewer pipes on private property (Lintott); and auth. ;the acceptance of funds to be received from the sale of two structures at 12602 and 12606 Ashworth Avenue North.
